description:
When a pair of mysterious necklaces that unleash the wearer’s deepest desire make the rounds at martial arts shrine, no pretty face is safe from the lust that lurks within!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Miej wzgląd na wojowników niczym na dzieci
Sieh deine Soldaten als deine Kinder an
Sotsu o Miru Koto Eiji no Gotoshi
Un chef chérit ses soldats comme un fils bien-aimé
卒を視ること嬰児のごとし
